sn44.2:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
sn44.2:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma anuradho bhagavato avidure arannakutikayam viharati.
sn44.2:1.3: Atha kho sambahula annatitthiya paribbajaka yenayasma anuradho tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmata anuradhena saddhim sammodimsu.
sn44.2:1.4: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te annatitthiya paribbajaka ayasmantam anuradham etadavocum:
sn44.2:1.5: “yo so, avuso anuradha, tathagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, tam tathagato imesu catusu thanesu pannapayamano pannapeti:
sn44.2:1.6: ‘hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va”ti?
sn44.2:1.7: “Yo so, avuso, tathagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, tam tathagato annatra imehi catuhi thanehi pannapayamano pannapeti:
sn44.2:1.8: ‘hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati va”ti.
sn44.2:1.9: Evam vutte, te annatitthiya paribbajaka ayasmantam anuradham etadavocum:
sn44.2:1.10: “so cayam bhikkhu navo bhavissati acirapabbajito, thero va pana balo abyatto”ti.
sn44.2:1.11: Atha kho te annatitthiya paribbajaka ayasmantam anuradham navavadena ca balavadena ca apasadetva utthayasana pakkamimsu.
sn44.2:2.1: Atha kho ayasmato anuradhassa acirapakkantesu annatitthiyesu paribbajakesu etadahosi:
sn44.2:2.2: “sace kho mam te annatitthiya paribbajaka uttarim puccheyyum,
sn44.2:2.3: katham byakaramano nu khvaham tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam vuttavadi ceva bhagavato assam, na ca bhagavantam abhutena abbhacikkheyyam, dhammassa canudhammam byakareyyam, na ca koci sahadhammiko vadanuvado garayham thanam agaccheyya”ti?
sn44.2:2.4: Atha kho ayasma anuradho yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anuradho bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn44.2:2.6: Atha kho, bhante, sambahula annatitthiya paribbajaka yenaham tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva maya saddhim sammodimsu.
sn44.2:2.7: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho, bhante, te annatitthiya paribbajaka mam etadavocum:
sn44.2:2.8: ‘yo so, avuso anuradha, tathagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, tam tathagato imesu catusu thanesu pannapayamano pannapeti:
sn44.2:2.10: “neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana”ti va’ti?
sn44.2:2.11: Evam vuttaham, bhante, te annatitthiye paribbajake etadavocam:
sn44.2:2.12: ‘yo so, avuso, tathagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, tam tathagato annatra imehi catuhi thanehi pannapayamano pannapeti:
sn44.2:2.14: “neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana”ti va’ti.
sn44.2:2.15: Evam vutte, bhante, te annatitthiya paribbajaka mam etadavocum:
sn44.2:2.16: ‘so cayam bhikkhu navo bhavissati acirapabbajito thero va pana balo abyatto’ti.
sn44.2:2.17: Atha kho mam, bhante, te annatitthiya paribbajaka navavadena ca balavadena ca apasadetva utthayasana pakkamimsu.
sn44.2:2.18: Tassa mayham, bhante, acirapakkantesu tesu annatitthiyesu paribbajakesu etadahosi:
sn44.2:2.19: ‘sace kho mam te annatitthiya paribbajaka uttarim puccheyyum, katham byakaramano nu khvaham tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam vuttavadi ceva bhagavato assam, na ca bhagavantam abhutena abbhacikkheyyam, dhammassa canudhammam byakareyyam, na ca koci sahadhammiko vadanuvado garayham thanam agaccheyya’”ti?
sn44.2:5.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn44.2:7.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn44.2:11.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn44.2:13.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn44.2:15.1: “Tasmatiha, anuradha, yam kinci rupam atitanagatapaccuppannam ajjhattam va bahiddha va olarikam va sukhumam va hinam va panitam va yam dure santike va, sabbam rupam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn44.2:15.5: yam kinci vinnanam atitanagatapaccuppannam ajjhattam va bahiddha va olarikam va sukhumam va hinam va panitam va yam dure santike va, sabbam vinnanam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn44.2:15.6: Evam passam, anuradha, sutava ariyasavako rupasmimpi nibbindati, vedanayapi nibbindati, sannayapi nibbindati, sankharesupi nibbindati, vinnanasmimpi nibbindati.
sn44.2:15.7: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn44.2:15.8: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
sn44.2:17.2: rupam, vedanam, sannam, sankhare, vinnanam tathagatoti samanupassasi”ti?
sn44.2:17.5: ayam so arupi avedano asanni asankharo avinnano tathagatoti samanupassasi”ti?
sn44.2:17.7: “Ettha ca te, anuradha, dittheva dhamme saccato thetato tathagate anupalabbhiyamane kallam nu te tam veyyakaranam—
sn44.2:17.8: yo so, avuso, tathagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, tam tathagato annatra imehi catuhi thanehi pannapayamano pannapeti:
sn44.2:17.10: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va”ti?
sn44.2:17.13: Pubbe caham, anuradha, etarahi ca dukkhanceva pannapemi dukkhassa ca nirodhan”ti.
